pr_title: Add compare and branch JIT Test

timeline.bodyText:
We should add a bit of documentation on what exactly this unit test is trying to capture. Things we should do:

Explain what issue the test is trying to capture
Reference the fix

There is a decent example of this in [1] for a Z bug.
[1] https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/blob/3fb280271d4b3093c611858b62d13f9fba6c6700/test/functional/JIT_Test/src/jit/test/ra/TestOOLSpill31Bit.java#L41-L49
timeline.author: fjeremic

timeline.message:
Fix Copyright and add comment to test

Signed-off-by: Rahil Shah <rahil@ca.ibm.com>

Add compare and branch JIT Test

Add a unit test to test Compare and Branch instruction
generation in JIT compiled code when we are comparing
two VFT nodes.

Signed-off-by: Rahil Shah <rahil@ca.ibm.com>
